verbose_text: We measured UBE2L3 protein levels by intracellular flow cytometry in B cell subsets in blood samples from healthy individuals and SLE affected individuals (XREF_FIG A-6C) and observed that UBE2L3 was 3- to 4-fold more abundant in circulating CD19 mid CD20 - CD27 hi CD38 hi IgD - plasmablasts (p < 0.0001) and CD20 - CD27 hi CD38 hi IgD - CD138 hi plasma cells (p < 0.0001) compared to transitional, naive, and memory B cells.
